resources.string: In photography light is one of the main facts. When you are taking a selfie, or any photo for that matter, you have to have good lighting!
Find your best side and your best angle. Do not be scared to try something different. Experiment a lot, and it is one of the secrets of good selfie.
Selfie is not a matter of something very serious. So take is easy and be casual as much as you like. Take a picture of you engaging in a fun activity.
A full-length mirror works well for this type of selfie shot. Again, angle your body to the left or right, which is generally more flattering than shooting straight on.
If your shoulders are parallel to the camera, turn them slightly to the left and then slightly to the right, and see what looks best. This is one of the important facts.
The best selfies have more than just a face. There are something interesting to look at in the background. But it should be clear and relevant to your expression.
An obvious but challenging tip to execute is to be still when you take your photos. Take a deep breath, try to relax and hold your pose. And see what happens!
